Name: maximize_team_productivity
Description: Maximize average story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_sprint_blockers
Description: Minimize number of unresolved blockers per sprint

Name: maximize_worker_utilization
Description: Maximize sum of worker availability used efficiently

Name: maximize_backlog_clarity
Description: Maximize number of user stories with fully defined acceptance criteria

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize number of sprints where goal was not achieved

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize ratio of features with linked documentation

Name: minimize_technical_debt_tasks
Description: Minimize number of tasks labeled as technical debt

Name: maximize_sprint_completion_rate
Description: Maximize ratio of completed tasks in sprint backlog

Name: minimize_requirement_ambiguity
Description: Minimize count of user stories missing priority or story points

Name: maximize_team_stability
Description: Maximize number of workers with long tenure (start_date)

Name: minimize_sprint_duration_waste
Description: Minimize unused time between sprint end and release

Name: maximize_skill_coverage
Description: Maximize number of required skills present in team

Name: minimize_context_switching
Description: Minimize number of tasks per worker across sprints
